example.parse: (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN محاولات) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التمييع))) (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3FS+IV_PASS+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تواجه) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-TMP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC المرة))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حزم) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN استثنائي)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يسمح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN امرار) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجريمة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجديدة))) (PP-MNR (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN دون) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اقتصاص)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الجهات)) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الضالعة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (PRON_3FS ها))))))))))))))))))))))
example.arg: من دون اقتصاص من الجهات الضالعة فيها
